frontpage.title: Welcome to tokipona! LOL.
frontpage.content:
Hello! I hope this place makes it easier for you to learn tokipona!

toki! mi wile e ni: tomo ni li pona e toki pona tawa sina!

levels.description: Learn how to use more things obviously.
